amendment.description: Amendment to increase and then decrease the amount provided for Wildland Fire Management by $2 million in order to apply additional funds to the Volunteer Fire Assistance grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A096) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A096) offered by Mr. Polis.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A096) Agreed to by voice vote.
